function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Implementing measures to control population density, promoting remote work, improving ventilation systems","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reconfigure urban design to promote social distancing, improve ventilation in indoor spaces","category":"Improve physical health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Improved sanitation measures, reduced occupancy, ventilation and air filtration systems","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Education and promotion of infection-fighting solutions, improved access to technology and resources","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improved urban planning, zoning, and building design, emphasis on public health priorities","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Thorough inspection and adaptation of buildings, renovation according to modern health and safety standards","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improved infrastructure, better governance, and demographic management to decrease the vulnerability of urban areas to infectious diseases.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular maintenance and cleaning of air conditioning, plumbing, and hot water systems to prevent the spread of disease-causing pathogens.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improving ventilation, drainage systems, and building design, implementing strict sanitation measures, and promoting social distancing","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Improving sewage systems, implementing proper waste management practices","category":"Greywater management","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Design and construct buildings with adequate sunlight and ventilation, utilize architectural features such as
